verbose_text: For the expression of HKT1, HKT2, SOS1, AKT1, and NHX1, in leaves, it recorded 30.8-, 10.2-, 26.5-, 6.2-, and 4.3-fold increase (NaCl vs. control) in CM72 and 7.0-, 7.6-, 3.6-, 4.5-, and 3.6-fold increase in Suntop, while only a small decrease in Sunmate (XREF_FIG A).
evidence: expression of HKT1, HKT2, SOS1, AKT1, and NHX1
